overview: Even the most innocent looking twinks can sometimes hide the sordid, sexually deviant minds, and this selection of Eurocreme's most beautiful stars take us on a journey of exhibitionism, hedonism and pure sexual fantasy as their tight young bodies writhe and tense against each other in hot, sticky situations that deserve us looking in great close-up angles. Fallen Angels features scenes from classic DreamBoy titles, where Innocence really is only skin deep...
title: Fallen Angels
